title: HOUR 1- Mark Jackson Sep 02, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 1- Mark Jackson Sep 02, 2020
description:
Mark Jackson tells Dan that he was not recruited by John Thompson and Georgetown. Mark said that Coach Thompson was the only coach that he didn't play for that he wishes he could have played for. Jackson says he always admired how the Georgetown players loved Coach Thompson and he loved the way Coach Thompson protected his players.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Mark Jackson tells Dan that he was not recruited by John Thompson and Georgetown. Mark said that Coach Thompson was the only coach that he didn't play for that he wishes he could have played for. Jackson says he always admired how the Georgetown players loved Coach Thompson and he loved the way Coach Thompson protected his players.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
